§ 31503. Laboratory productivity The Administration’s laboratories are a critical component of the Administration’s research capabilities, and the Administrator shall ensure that those laboratories remain productive. (Pub. L. 111–314, § 3, Dec. 18, 2010, 124 Stat. 3377.)
